attributes.action: Moratorium On Climate Change Legislation Pending Review
attributes.additional_details:
Sir Muir Russell's enquiry into the Climate-Gate 1 scandal are beginning to look discredited with the revelations appearing in the recently leaked emails from Climate Gate 2; the whole thing requires urgent review.

We the signees call upon the government to call for an immeadiate review into these fresh allegations; further, we also call for a moratorium on funding for climate change legislation at both a local and national level, to NGOs, QuANGOs and Universities until the enquiry proves beyond reasonable doubt that there has been no deliberate attempt to mislead or misrepresent the science.
